text: daavood ne kahaah usane tumapar avashy atyaachaar kiya, tumhaaree bhed ko (milaane kee) maang karake apanee bhedon mein tatha bahut-se saajhee ek-doosare par etyaachaar karate hain, unake siva, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye aur bahut thode hain aise log aur daavood ne bhaanp lee ki hamane usakee pareeksha lee hai, to sahasa usane kshama yaachana kar lee aur gir gaya sajde mein tatha dhyaanamagn ho gaya
